Detailed Description

Control for managing menu hierarchies. The menu-hierarchy and the look of each menu-item is defined by an instance of the class AbstractMenuAccessor. Comfortable accessors are available in the AddOn GuiMenuAccessors.

void CalendarGrid::Invalidate (  const Rect &  rect = Rect(),
BOOLEAN  erase = TRUE
) 
 

Invalidates a specified area of the control. This leads to a repaint of this area in the next idle-state of the application.

Parameters:
rect Specifies the area by a rectangle. The coordinates are relative to the upper left position of the control. If no rectangle is specified, the whole area will be invalidated.
erase Indicates, whether the control should be erased before Control::OnPaint is called. By default erase is TRUE.
